text: te'oni iccha che ke jevi rite te'o inkara karanara che tame pana te'oni jema inkara karava lago ane pachi badha sarakha bani java, basa! Jyam sudhi a loko islama mate vatana na chode, te'o manthi ko'ine pana saca mitra na banavo, pachi jo a loko modhum pheravi le to te'one pakado ane katala kari do jyam pana te'o mali jaya, khabaradara! Te'o manthi ko'ine pana potano mitra ane madada karanara na samaji leso
